#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
//int Table[]
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    //dp();
    while(t--)
    {
        int n,m;
        cin>>m;
        n=m;
        int sum=0;
        while(n)
        {
            sum=sum+n%10;n=n/10;
        }
        //cout<<sum<<" "<<n<<" ";
        cout<<m%sum<<"\n";
   }
}
